title: Micah, The Fierce Takes On Emma, The Brave
description: Meet Micah Turner, professional hockey player and loner. He lives by a strict personal code that keeps him from getting hurt. Warm and loving Emma Matthews runs a successful salon and doesn't have time for love and sex. One night, their paths collide. Enchanted by Emmaâ€™s sensuality, Micah submits to a sensual night of seduction and connection. Their intense chemistry propels them to explore the depths of their attraction and takes them farther than they ever expected. Their journey will leave you breathless and panting for more....Other stories in this The Fierce Nails Emma, The Brave (pt. 2) Micah, The Fierce Dominates Emma, The Brave (pt. 3)Micah, The Fierce Aches For Emma, The Brave (pt.4)Micah, The Fierce Toys With Emma, The Brave (pt. 5)Micah, The Fierce Knocks Up Emma, The Brave (pt. 6)Please check me out on facebook
author: Jessa Eden
